S.FORM: 22 Nda irou ra 'illing-hen tyn ka Mei-sasou ka Si-bavau ta ti Archelaus tou Jud-ea mivariou ki Raraman tyn ka ti Herodes, ni-mah-takout sah-ka-qua hynna ta teni: Ra dou ni-pa-kou-sou-an tou maling, ni-thabul tou Ibæ-Ibægh ki Galilëa.
23 Irou ka lummalmad iroua' hynna, ni-mou-rylla tou Euma ka pa-nanang-en Nazareth: alei ka pa-væut-auh ta na sou ki Tama-Matt'æi-tan, ka pa-nanang-eih ta teni ka Nazarenus.
1 Ka tou wæ'i k'anna ni-roua ta ti Joannes ka Tama Eulough matta-sasou tou pæulæpæu-lægh ki Judea.
2 Koun; Si lalâ [pa-salikough-â ki vana-oumi ki rygh] ka ni-mou-touk ta pei-sasou-an ki tounoun ki vulluvullum.

3 Ka teni ta ti atta ka ni-pa-sousou-en ki Mattæi-tan ka ti Esajas, koun; Yngau ki Makou-lan-gægh tou pæulæpæulægh, Si-d'a d'arang-â paka-parilpil ki darang ki MEIRANG, pei-tiktik-au ta 'ouh-kakoun tyn.
